text: Joseph Marcell (born 18 August 1948) is a Saint Lucian born British actor."Joseph Marcell" , Artreach, National Arts Festival, St Lucia. He is best known for his role as Geoffrey the butler on the NBC sitcom The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air from September 1990, until it ended in May 1996. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Alex Fletcher, "What happened to Geoffrey from The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air?" , TV interview, Digital Spy, 24 February 2014. * "Caribbean Footsteps meets with Joseph Marcell". title: Joseph Marcell
